info.title: Catalog API - Seller Portal
info.description:
With the Catalog API for Seller Portal, you will be able to create, edit and consult products and their variations, brands, and categories.

> This API is part of the [Seller Portal Catalog](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/how-the-seller-portal-catalog-works--7pMB6YOt6YQDQQbzFB4Pxp). This functionality is in the Beta stage and can be discontinued at any moment at VTEX's discretion. VTEX will not be responsible for any instabilities caused by its use or discontinuity. If you have any questions, please contact [our Support Center](https://support.vtex.com/hc/en-us/requests).

## Index

### Product

- `GET` [Get Product by ID](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#get-/api/catalog-seller-portal/products/-productId-)
- `PUT` [Update Product](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#put-/api/catalog-seller-portal/products/-productId-)
- `GET` [Get Product Description by Product ID](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#get-/api/catalog-seller-portal/products/-productId-/description)
- `PUT` [Update Product Description by Product ID](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#put-/api/catalog-seller-portal/products/-productId-/description)
- `GET` [Get Product by external ID, SKU ID, SKU external ID or slug](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#get-/api/catalog-seller-portal/products/-param-)
- `POST` [Create Product](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#post-/api/catalog-seller-portal/products)

### SKU

- `GET` [Search for SKU](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#get-/api/catalog-seller-portal/skus/_search)
- `GET` [Get List of SKUs](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#get-/api/catalog-seller-portal/skus/ids)

### Brand

- `GET` [Get List of Brands](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#get-/api/catalog-seller-portal/brands)
- `POST` [Create a Brand](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#post-/api/catalog-seller-portal/brands)
- `GET` [Get Brand by ID](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#get-/api/catalog-seller-portal/brands/-brandId-)
- `PUT` [Update Brand](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#put-/api/catalog-seller-portal/brands/-brandId-)

### Category

- `GET` [Get Category Tree](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#get-/api/catalog-seller-portal/category-tree)
- `PUT` [Update Category Tree](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#put-/api/catalog-seller-portal/category-tree)
- `GET` [Get Category by ID](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#get-/api/catalog-seller-portal/category-tree/categories/-categoryId-)
- `POST` [Create a Category](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/catalog-api-seller-portal#post-/api/catalog-seller-portal/category-tree/categories)

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Product unique identifier number.

externalId.description: Product reference unique identifier number in the store.

status.description: Status of the product. Its values can be `active` or `inactive`.

name.description: Product Name. Use simple words and avoid other languages or complex writing. This field is essential for SEO and must respect the 150 character limit.

brandName.description: Name of the Brand associated with the product.

categoryIds.description: Product's Categories unique identifier numbers. It can have multiples IDs for each Category and Subcategories.

categoryNames.description: Names of the product's categories, displayed in a path format.

specs.description: Specifications that will differentiate the possible product SKUs.

attributes.description: Attributes of the product. Attributes are additional properties used to create site browsing filters.

slug.description: Reference of the product in the URL of the store.

images.description: Information of the images of the product.

url.description: Image URL, which must be in the following format: `https://{accountName}.vtexassets.com/assets/{path}`, saved using the [Catalog Images app](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-catalog-images).

externalId.description: Unique reference code created to improve the store's organization. This is not a required field.

ean.description: Unique SKU identification code (barcode), composed of up to 13 numeric characters.

manufacturerCode.description: SKU reference code in the store.

isActive.description: If the SKU is active (`true`) or inactive (`false`).

specs.description: SKU specifications. This field is mandatory, but nullable if there is only one SKU.

origin.description: Origin account of the product. It is not possible to alter products where the origin is `marketplace`.

createdAt.description: Date when the product was created.

updatedAt.description: Last date when the product was updated.

id.description: SKU unique identifier number. Do not include this field when adding a new SKU, only when editing existing SKUs.

name.description: SKU Name. Use simple words and avoid other languages or complex writing. This field is essential for SEO and must respect the 150 character limit.

externalId.description: Unique reference code created to improve the store's organization. This is not a required field.

ean.description: Unique SKU identification code (barcode), composed of up to 13 numeric characters.

manufacturerCode.description: SKU reference code in the store.

isActive.description: Defines if the SKU is active (`true`) or inactive (`false`).

specs.description: SKU specifications. This field is mandatory, but nullable if there is only one SKU.

origin.description: Origin account of the product. It is not possible to alter products where the origin is `marketplace`.

get.summary: Get Product Description by Product ID
get.description:
>ðŸ“˜ This API is part of the [Seller Portal Catalog](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/how-the-seller-portal-catalog-works--7pMB6YOt6YQDQQbzFB4Pxp). This functionality is in the Beta stage and can be discontinued at any moment at VTEX's discretion. VTEX will not be responsible for any instabilities caused by its use or discontinuity. If you have any questions, please contact [our Support Center](https://support.vtex.com/hc/en-us/requests). 

 Retrieves the description of a product given a Product ID.

## Response body example

```json
{
    "productId": "61",
    "description": "Beautifully handmade laptop case/sleeve made in the Nepal Himalaya. It can be slipped inside your backpack or carried alone with space for all your work bits and pieces!",
    "createdAt": "2022-10-10T19:18:45.612317Z",
    "updatedAt": "2022-10-11T18:12:58.825544Z"
}
```

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Product unique identifier number.

example.description: Beautifully handmade laptop case/sleeve made in the Nepal Himalaya. It can be slipped inside your backpack or carried alone with space for all your work bits and pieces!

createdAt.description: Date when the brand was created.

updatedAt.description: Last date when the brand was updated.

put.summary: Update Product Description by Product ID
put.description:
>ðŸ“˜ This API is part of the [Seller Portal Catalog](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/how-the-seller-portal-catalog-works--7pMB6YOt6YQDQQbzFB4Pxp). This functionality is in the Beta stage and can be discontinued at any moment at VTEX's discretion. VTEX will not be responsible for any instabilities caused by its use or discontinuity. If you have any questions, please contact [our Support Center](https://support.vtex.com/hc/en-us/requests). 

 Updates the description of a product given a Product ID.

## Request body example

```json
{
    "productId": "71",
    "description": "White shirt."
}
```

get.summary: Get Product by external ID,  SKU ID, SKU external ID or slug

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: This part of the path must follow this format: `{param}={value}`. Replace `{param}` with the name of the parameter used to fetch a product, which can be one of the following: `external-id` (product reference unique identifier number in the store), `sku-id` (SKU unique identifier number), `sku-external-id` (SKU reference unique identifier number in the store) or `slug` (reference of the product in the URL of the store). Replace `{value}` with the value of the selected param. Make sure there is a `=` between them.

parameters.description: The first page of the interval of the product list.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The last page of the interval of the product list.

parameters.description: SKU unique idenfier number.

parameters.name: externalid
parameters.description: SKU reference unique identifier number in the store.

data.description: List with information about the SKU.

externalId.description: Unique identifier number of the association of the SKU with a Franchise Account.

_metadata.description: Information about the organization and exhibition of the SKU list.

total.description: Total of SKUs on the list.

from.description: The first page of the interval of the SKU list.

to.description: The last page of the interval of the SKU list.

get.description:
>ðŸ“˜ This API is part of the [Seller Portal Catalog](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/how-the-seller-portal-catalog-works--7pMB6YOt6YQDQQbzFB4Pxp). This functionality is in the Beta stage and can be discontinued at any moment at VTEX's discretion. VTEX will not be responsible for any instabilities caused by its use or discontinuity. If you have any questions, please contact [our Support Center](https://support.vtex.com/hc/en-us/requests). 

 Retrieves general information about all SKUs.

## Response body example

```json
{
    "data": [
        "1",
        "10",
        "11",
        "12",
        "13",
        "14",
        "15",
        "16",
        "19",
        "2",
        "20",
        "21",
        "22",
        "23",
        "24"
    ],
    "_metadata": {
        "total": 65,
        "from": 1,
        "to": 15
    }
}
```

parameters.description: The last page of the interval of the product list.

parameters.description: Type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search word.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The first page of the interval of the brand list.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The last page of the interval of the brand list.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The order that the list is displayed. You can select `name`, or `updated_at` to select the order criteria. Then you can add `,` , `asc` or `desc` to define the brands order.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Brand name.

data.description: List with information about the store's brands.

isActive.description: The condition defines if the brand is active (`true`) or inactive (`false`).

createdAt.description: Date when the brand was created.

updatedAt.description: Last date when the brand was updated.

_metadata.description: Information about the organization and exhibition of the brand list.

total.description: Total of brands on the list.

from.description: The first page of the interval of the brand list.

to.description: The last page of the interval of the brand list.

orderBy.description: The order that the list is displayed. You can select `name`, or `updated_at` to select the order criteria. Then you can add `,` , `asc` or `desc` to define the brands order.

post.description:
>ðŸ“˜ This API is part of the [Seller Portal Catalog](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/how-the-seller-portal-catalog-works--7pMB6YOt6YQDQQbzFB4Pxp). This functionality is in the Beta stage and can be discontinued at any moment at VTEX's discretion. VTEX will not be responsible for any instabilities caused by its use or discontinuity. If you have any questions, please contact [our Support Center](https://support.vtex.com/hc/en-us/requests). 

 Creates a new brand.

## Request body example

```json
{
  "name": "Zwilling",
  "isActive": true
}
```

## Response body example

```json
{
  "id": "20",
  "name": "Zwilling",
  "isActive": true,
  "createdAt": "2021-05-17T15:20:36.077253+00:00",
  "updatedAt": "2021-01-18T14:41:45.696488+00:00"
}
```

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Type of the content being sent.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

isActive.description: The condition defines if the brand is active (`true`) or inactive (`false`).
The condition defines if the brand is active (`true`) or inactive (`false`).

createdAt.description: Date when the brand was created.

updatedAt.description: Last date when the brand was updated.

get.description:
>ðŸ“˜ This API is part of the [Seller Portal Catalog](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/how-the-seller-portal-catalog-works--7pMB6YOt6YQDQQbzFB4Pxp). This functionality is in the Beta stage and can be discontinued at any moment at VTEX's discretion. VTEX will not be responsible for any instabilities caused by its use or discontinuity. If you have any questions, please contact [our Support Center](https://support.vtex.com/hc/en-us/requests). 

 Retrieves general information about a brand by its ID.

## Response body example

```json
{
  "id": "863",
  "name": "Zwilling",
  "isActive": false,
  "createdAt": "2021-01-18T14:41:45.696488+00:00",
  "updatedAt": "2021-01-18T14:41:45.696488+00:00"
}
```

updatedAt.description: Last date when the brand was updated.

 Updates an existing brand. 

## Request body example

```json
{
  "id": "20",
  "name": "Zwilling",
  "isActive": true
}
```
